  • Constructor Details

  • Method Details

    • accumulate

      public abstract void accumulate(double y, double prediction)
      Accumulation step. For a given target and prediction, a performance score is obtained and added to the global score metricCumSum. The performance is calculated differently depending on the metric.
      Parameters:
      y - Target .
      prediction - Predicted value.

    • reduce

      public void reduce()
      Reduction step. The global score is divided by the number of seen observations to get a relative score (average).

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Method to reinitialize the parameters.

    • getName

      public abstract String getName()
      Getter to obtain the metric's name.
      Returns:
      The name of the performance metric.

    • getMetricCumSum

      public double getMetricCumSum()
